description.english: Oh, my! The world is chaotic!
Isn't it a piece of cake? Oh, it's the opposite side. It's okay now
description.schinese: 这不是易如反掌吗～啊，原来是对面啊，没事了
description.tchinese: 這不是易如反掌嗎～啊，原來是對面啊，沒事了

description.english: You said the same every time

displayName.english: I can't do anything about you

description.english: (Helpless) (Arrogant) (Domineering) I can't do anything about you
description.schinese: （扶额）（傲娇）（霸气）真拿你没办法
description.tchinese: （扶額）（傲嬌）（霸氣）真拿你沒辦法

description.english: Yichen or childhood sweetheart, you have made a choice
description.schinese: 妹妹和青梅，你已作出选择了
description.tchinese: 妹妹和青梅，你已作出選擇了

description.english: It seems like I just got to know you
Love is not easy, I want to sigh
Reward for not letting Yichen down
Share with you the delicious food and fun stories
description.schinese: 好吃、好玩、好笑，都分你一半
description.tchinese: 好吃、好玩、好笑，都分你一半

displayName.english: Miss Xu from the Xu family
I can't think of more excuses

description.english: Everything a man says is right (sure)
description.schinese: 男人说什么都是对的（确信）
description.tchinese: 男人說什麽都是對的（確信）

description.english: Beauty, please stay away from me
The core socialist values will protect me
I give up because I care
I don't know. Who said that?
You understand the language of stars
The moon is beautiful tonight, and the breeze is gentle
description.schinese: 今晚月色真美，风也很温柔
description.tchinese: 今晚月色真美 風也很溫柔

description.english: He who makes mistakes will be dismembered
We can reach all Ends of the Earth

description.schinese: 不存在的时间，不存在的人
description.tchinese: 不存在的時間，不存在的人

description.english: I go round and round. Fortunately, it's you in the end
description.schinese: 兜兜转转幸好那人是你
description.tchinese: 兜兜轉轉幸好那人是你

description.english: Fall in love bravely, it's beautiful
description.schinese: 勇敢去爱，本身就很美好啊
description.tchinese: 勇敢去愛，本身就很美好啊

description.english: I saw your true color the first time I saw you
description.schinese: 终于可以毫无保留的见你了
description.tchinese: 終於可以毫無保留的見你了

description.english: A bit more would be better

displayName.english: I don't want to work hard anymore

description.english: You are the only one for me in this multifarious world
Take care of your own business and think twice
description.schinese: 请想好，处理好自己的事再说
description.tchinese: 請想好，處理好自己的事再說

description.english: I'll pretend you didn't say that today
description.schinese: 就当你今天没说过这话
description.tchinese: 就當你今天沒說過這話

description.english: Well, I still can't quite accept this flavor.
description.schinese: 好像，无法接受这个味道
description.tchinese: 好像，無法接受這個味道

description.schinese: 犯过的错，已经救赎过了
description.tchinese: 犯過的錯，已經救贖過了
